testimonials.name: Professional Services Testimonials
testimonials.description: Trust-focused testimonials for professional services with case results
testimonials.template:
import Image from 'next/image' import { Star, Award, Scale, TrendingUp } from 'lucide-react' interface TestimonialsProps { headline: string description: string testimonials: Array<{ quote: string author: string role: string company: string rating: number image: string caseResult?: string resultMetric?: string }> trustIndicators: { totalClients: string successRate: string yearsExperience: string } } export default function Testimonials({ headline, description, testimonials, trustIndicators }: TestimonialsProps) { return (

{headline}

{description}

{/* Trust Indicators */}
{trustIndicators.totalClients}
Clients Served
{trustIndicators.successRate}
Success Rate
{trustIndicators.yearsExperience}
Years Experience
{testimonials.map((testimonial, index) => (
{[...Array(5)].map((_, i) => ( ))}
{testimonial.caseResult && (
{testimonial.caseResult}
)}
"{testimonial.quote}"
{testimonial.resultMetric && (
Result: {testimonial.resultMetric}
)}

{testimonial.author}

{testimonial.role}

{testimonial.company}

))}
Licensed Professionals • Proven Track Record • Client-Focused Results
) }

testimonials.name: Healthcare & Medical Testimonials
testimonials.description: Patient testimonials with health outcomes and care experiences

testimonials.name: Restaurant & Hospitality Testimonials
testimonials.description: Dining experience testimonials with food and service reviews

testimonials.name: Home Services Testimonials
testimonials.description: Customer testimonials for home service contractors with before/after results
testimonials.template:
import Image from 'next/image' import { Star, Wrench, CheckCircle, Clock, Award } from 'lucide-react' interface TestimonialsProps { headline: string description: string testimonials: Array<{ quote: string author: string location: string rating: number image: string serviceType: string projectResult?: string completionTime?: string }> serviceStats: { jobsCompleted: string customerSatisfaction: string responseTime: string } } export default function Testimonials({ headline, description, testimonials, serviceStats }: TestimonialsProps) { return (

{headline}

{description}

{/* Service Stats */}
{serviceStats.jobsCompleted}
Jobs Completed
{serviceStats.customerSatisfaction}
Customer Satisfaction
{serviceStats.responseTime}
Avg Response Time
{testimonials.map((testimonial, index) => (
{[...Array(5)].map((_, i) => ( ))}
{testimonial.serviceType}
"{testimonial.quote}"
{testimonial.projectResult && (
Result: {testimonial.projectResult}
)} {testimonial.completionTime && (
Completed: {testimonial.completionTime}
)}

{testimonial.author}

{testimonial.location}

))}
Licensed & Insured • 100% Satisfaction Guarantee • Emergency Service Available
) }

testimonials.name: Beauty & Wellness Testimonials
testimonials.description: Client testimonials for beauty and wellness services with transformation results

testimonials.name: Real Estate Testimonials
testimonials.description: Client testimonials for real estate services with transaction results
testimonials.template:
import Image from 'next/image' import { Star, Home, TrendingUp, Award, MapPin } from 'lucide-react' interface TestimonialsProps { headline: string description: string testimonials: Array<{ quote: string author: string location: string rating: number image: string transactionType: string propertyType?: string salePrice?: string timeOnMarket?: string }> marketStats: { propertiesSold: string avgDaysOnMarket: string clientSatisfaction: string } } export default function Testimonials({ headline, description, testimonials, marketStats }: TestimonialsProps) { return (

{headline}

{description}

{/* Market Stats */}
{marketStats.propertiesSold}
Properties Sold
{marketStats.avgDaysOnMarket}
Avg Days on Market
{marketStats.clientSatisfaction}
Client Satisfaction
{testimonials.map((testimonial, index) => (
{[...Array(5)].map((_, i) => ( ))}
{testimonial.transactionType}
"{testimonial.quote}"
{testimonial.salePrice && (
Sale Price: {testimonial.salePrice}
)} {testimonial.timeOnMarket && (
Time on Market: {testimonial.timeOnMarket}
)}
{testimonial.propertyType && (
Property Type: {testimonial.propertyType}
)}

{testimonial.author}

{testimonial.location}
))}
Licensed Realtor • MLS Member • Top 1% Producer • Market Expert
) }
